entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
